fields.summary: Android: Views with a large border width cover up children (even when opacity is set to .5)

comments.body:
The issue can be reproduced with release 3.0.2 and latest master version 3.1.0 .

Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build:  2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (24/02/2013)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (24/02/2013)
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4


Red view is visible upto borderWidth:25 ,and disappears for all value greater than 25, even  increase  width and height of child view(smallView).
There may be some aspect ratio between parent View(loadingIndicatorView) parameters(width and height) and borderWidth .

I am able to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Ti SDK 6.1.1.v20170626160851
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.2
Ti CLI 5.0.14
Alloy 1.9.11
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131
